Text:
System Requirements:

    * Operating System: Mac OS 8.6 or later
    * CPU Processor: PowerPC G3 or later
    * CPU Speed: 233MHz or faster
    * Memory: 32 MB or higher
    * Hard Disk Space: 650MB free disk space
    * Video Card (ATI): Rage Pro or better
    * Video Card (NVidia): GeForce Series or better
    * Video Memory (VRam): 8 MB or higher
    * Media Required: CD Drive

Supported on Power PC Macintosh Computers Only
Works fine. However, only works once. Anytime you quit the game after first play it requires a disc to boot the game.

Doesn't run on my MacBook, the videos show fine, but as soon as the game starts the screen goes black. Oh, and classic apps are not supported anymore. Any suggestions? 
2Ghz CoreDuo, 4Gb RAM.
OS Snow Leopard 10.6.7. Forgot to tell you.

@uldrak_g wrote: "classic apps are not supported anymore. Any suggestions?"

Yeah--get a G4 or G5. Core2 "Macs" are not really Macs at all. They're just PC clones. Sad, yes.
Well in MACS (upto Snow Leopard) there is an emulator called Rossetta which we can use to run old Mac games (Game before OS X). Mine is an Hackintosh - SL 10.6.8

one of the things i wanna do in my life is to play any TR game (old game engine) on a mac. game *check*
                                             mac *next birthday*

it works not on lion
it's a powerpc game
